actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a study of the most feasible and suitable means of preserving the resources of the Ohio and Erie Canal in the State of Ohio.

summary.text: Provides for a study of the most feasible and suitable means of preserving the resources of the Ohio and Erie Canal in Ohio. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to report on such study to the Congress within a year. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a study of the most feasible and suitable means of preserving the resources of the Ohio and Erie Canal in the State of Ohio.
